archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Establish DG management
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Establish and improve DG Management to achieve business objectives

properties.value: Establish DG management, Establishes and improves DG Management to achieve business objectives. It includes design DG architecture, design data quality solution, design data security solution, design data storage solution, design data presentation and distribution solution, and necessary support solutions, e.g. metadata management and data lifecycle management.
